Family.title: Family
Family.description: Represents a family unit and its overall financial status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Family entity.

description.description: A brief description of the family or its financial goals.

Income.title: Income
Income.description: Represents a source of income for the family.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Income entity.

source.description: Source of the income (e.g., salary, investment).

date.description: Date when the income was received.

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents an expense incurred by the family.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Expense entity.

category.description: Category of the expense (e.g., rent, groceries).

date.description: Date when the expense was incurred.

AttendanceSession.title: AttendanceSession
AttendanceSession.description: Represents a single attendance session for the Rohingya Wellness Group.

sessionNumber.description: The sequential number of the session.

attendance.description: A map of member names to their attendance status (true for present, false for absent).
